taskDescription: Activates ALFRED to explore new features
Share health data openly with her informal caregiver Sarah
Set cautious limits on medical staff’s access to her health data
Respond positively to video calls encouraging exercise participation
Enjoy the freedom and independence enabled by ALFRED
Value privacy outside of hospital contexts
Use ALFRED to maintain social connections and emotional engagement
Use ALFRED as a supportive companion for staying active and socially connected
Enjoy the presence of ALFRED throughout the day
Value autonomy and continuous connection provided by ALFRED
Interact with ALFRED using voice commands to perform daily activities
Respond to persistent reminders for exercises and health checks
Experience guilt when caregivers receive notifications late at night
Accepts voice reminders from ALFRED to start physical and cognitive exercises
Follows challenging workout prompts given by ALFRED
Feels motivated by the system pushing her to improve her health
Experiences mixed feelings about losing some control over exercise scheduling
Enjoys the social engagement features to reduce loneliness
Responds happily to ALFRED’s exercise prompts
Reflects briefly on the system’s insistence on forcing activities even when wanting rest
Tells ALFRED to start the health check-in
Wears wearable devices to track vital signs
Chooses to postpone challenging exercises after health check-in
Asks ALFRED detailed questions about heart rate trends
Requests explanations about health data in a clear way
Lets ALFRED activate automatically if health condition changes suddenly
Uses ALFRED to make a video call with her daughter
Shares her health progress during video calls
Negotiates with ALFRED to set reminders for healthcare appointments
Balances between accepting ALFRED's support and keeping personal freedom
Feels curious about managing her health better with ALFRED’s help
Wants ALFRED to respect her choices and not be too pushy
Feels concerned about becoming too dependent on ALFRED’s prompts
Appreciates natural and easy communication with ALFRED
Prefers flexible timing for receiving support and reminders
